column5: Come December there may be a city chain going across the ramp Last call! Here's a little web site I put together. G&F Check out the latest news letter. Volunteers are over taxed and it's starting to show. Please do one thing if you can or she be gone  Just the facts Dan
That wont be good if that happens to Port D

I visited the link and couldn't find anything about the ramp closure.... just OFAH affiliation stuff to support it opened for me.  Please advise on where the info on the ramp closure is.... I plan to use that ramp allot this Spring!
there is a couple spots on that page whre you can click to read the March '07 newsletter attachment - that is where it can be found

Sorry guys try this: http://www.scgameandfish.net/home.html You have to find the "Enter Site" on the front page. Guess I'll have to make it larger or clean up the clutter a bit. The news letter is on the left under "newsletters"  Dan
